entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Peters 06:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -8

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle or ice pellets this morning. Ice pellets beginning this afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to rain this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 9.
